name: gestion-locative-moderne
description: Application moderne de gestion locative avec React, Node.js et SQLite

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
